name: Embodied impacts and responsible sourcing - asking the right questions, developing a common language

description: This session aims to clarify the breadth of embodied impacts, demonstrate the importance of formal standards and regulations and encourage the use of a common language between the designers, specifiers and contractors who are assessing the embodied impacts amd responsible sourcing of construction materials.
